DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ( 1 ) track dementia caregiver health indicator 12 week , without Mindoula plus DANA intervention ( case manager mobile message assessment application ) determine intervention improve caregiver health ( 2 ) obtain feedback caregiver inform design future intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: This study track mental status cognition caregiver without Mindoula DANA intervention use subject feedback aid design future intervention caregiver . This remotely administer , virtual study target dementia caregiver mild moderately depress . Screening call online administration four survey determine inclusion study arm . These survey take Health-eBrain website , baseline/screening throughout participation . All participation complete participant 's mobile phone , psychological cognitive test self-administered . This study between-group design . Participants screen eligibility randomize arm . The intervention arm receive Mindoula plus DANA intervention . The wait list control arm take psychological survey regular interval , 12 week , enrol DANA-only observation group . The DANA-only group take DANA usability questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Females male regularly provide care person Alzheimer 's Disease Between age 4575 Selfreported ability speak read English Providing care least year Participants Intervention Waitlist Control Arms must meet following additional inclusion criterion : Zarit Burden Inventory ( ZBI ) Score 9+ Overall M3 score 33+ M3 Depression score 7+ Female Only Minimum hour caregiving week must equal great 20 hour Anyone know cognitive diagnosis Anyone color blindness Overall score high risk M3 and/or high risk PTSD Bipolar subsection M3 Failure meet inclusion criterion per arm
